pageContent.title: Take a Deeper Look
pageContent.descriptionText: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:16pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px; padding:0 0 0 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Take a Deeper Look</Introtext><welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:12pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:normal; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">“Although the Maycomb cardiology department is interested in all of these metrics, the most important one is patient satisfaction, which may indicate successfully treated, satisfied patients. The achievement of patient treatment goals may in turn positively impact the professional reputation of the department and hospital, which is one of the cardiology department’s top priorities. Patient satisfaction is the metric to focus on in understanding the departmental goals, as you move forward in your conversation with Dr. Gomez.”</welcomeText>
